UserDevicesSettings.description: Settings for mobile device registration and management

enableStaticSecurityCode.description: Whether to enable static security codes for device registration

staticSecurityCodes.description: List of valid static security codes

validSecurityCodeCharacters.description: Valid characters that can be used in security codes

appKeyLength.description: Length of the mobile app key

enabled.description: Whether implicit device registration is enabled

minimumIosVersion.description: Minimum iOS version required for implicit registration

minimumAndroidVersion.description: Minimum Android version required for implicit registration

cardControl.description: Card control settings for device registration

enableAllMerchantTypes.description: Whether to enable all merchant types on registration

enableAllTransactionTypes.description: Whether to enable all transaction types on registration
